pages.text: Skip to content Welcome to VFW Post 10624 & Auxillary About Us No one does more for Veterans We understand the unique bond you share with other veterans of overseas conflicts because we, too, have been there. No matter which conflict called you to service, we invite you to join us as we continue to fight for all that’s good FOR VETERANS. Learn more Still Serving The Mount Pleasant, SC VFW Post 10624 is deeply committed to serving those who have bravely served their country. This dedication stems from a profound sense of camaraderie and a shared understanding of the sacrifices made by veterans. The post recognizes that the transition from military to civilian life can be challenging, and it strives to ease this process by offering support and advocacy for veterans and their families. By providing assistance in filing applications for benefits from the Department of Veterans Affairs, the post ensures that veterans receive the recognition and support they deserve. Moreover, the VFW post acts as a pillar of community, fostering an environment where veterans can find solidarity, access resources, and engage in activities that contribute to their well-being. Their tireless efforts are a testament to the belief that those who have served their nation deserve unwavering support and the opportunity to lead fulfilling lives post-service. Community Outreach We are the voice of veterans in the Lowcountry. We remember the sacrifices and honor their memory through service. Everyday is an outreach for us. Leadership and Guidance Our activities often involve local R.O.T.C. cadets and other youth volunteers. We provide opportunities for service and to earn distinction through actions. Event Space Let us be your host! From community oyster roasts to private events. The Mt. Pleasant VFW can be your event venue with full kitchen for up to 125 people.
